text: @Acosta We in FL and elsewhere have been left to die during the pandemic. Thanks @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovRonDeSantis @GOP. Now the kids are following. I 🙏🏻To COVID-19 virus get all of you. You all deserve the fate of your victims and worse.
